Constable -- Justice of the Peace & Constable District 4
Chief of Police -- Town of Zwolle
Converse School District No. 8A -- 12.90 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Converse School District No. 8A Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Converse School District No. 8A of Sabine Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of twelve and ninety hundredths (12.90) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $568,890 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, operating, maintaining and supporting public schools in the District, said millage to represent a four and thirty-eight hundredths mills (4.38) increase over the 8.52 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2015 pursuant to an election held on April 23, 2005?

Race.SpecificTitle: Ebarb School District No. 17 -- 16.09 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ebarb School District No. 17 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Ebarb School District No. 17 of Sabine Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of sixteen and nine hundredths (16.09) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $77,232 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, operating, maintaining and supporting public schools in the District, said millage to represent a four and eighty-eight hundredths mills (4.88) increase over the 11.21 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2015 pursuant to an election held on April 23, 2005?

Race.SpecificTitle: Negreet School District No. 62A -- 6.63 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Negreet School District No. 62A Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Negreet School District No. 62A of Sabine Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of six and sixty-three hundredths (6.63) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $165,087 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, operating, maintaining and supporting public schools in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: South Sabine Cons. Sch. Dist. No. 20 -- 7.82 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
South Sabine Consolidated School District No. 20 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall South Sabine Consolidated School District No. 20 of Sabine Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of seven and eighty-two hundredths (7.82) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $144,670 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, operating, maintaining and supporting public schools in the District, said millage to represent a six hundredths of a mill (.06) increase over the 7.76 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2015 pursuant to an election held on April 23, 2005?
